body_html:
@peterjc123 @apaszke Thanks for your comments! Sounds like sticking with VS2017 will just be easier. I'll hang on to this branch in case anyone ever needs to build in VS2015.

Updating to 14.1 might not be needed, but I think it will still give you constant warnings. That is a separate issue than this PR.

Updating to 14.1 might not be needed, but I think it will still give you constant warnings. That is a separate issue than this PR.
